alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:58PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 930 PM MST... At 757 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Christmas, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hayden and Christmas. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 77 between mile markers 135 and 143, and between mile markers 146 and 168. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 137 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos
